overview: Small town girl Jamie has made the difficult decision to tell her parents that she is in a same sex relationship. Unfortunately her family does not react well to the news and Jamie decides to go to Los Angeles to visit her best friend Sarah. Jamie is happy to find California is far more accepting. Finally able to be who she really is, Jamie meets a woman named Pam. As things heat up between Jamie and Pam, Sarah begins acting strange. Is it because Sarah doesn't like Pam or maybe Sarah wants to be more than friends..?
tagline: In the City of Angels... she's just found hers.
title: Girlfriends
